Text: Thanks! It's a shame they cancelled this show.
Thanx for the season. My jaw was dropped for 30 minutes after the season finale. The worst cancellation of a show in my life!

HARD SUBS SUCK!!! A waste of time. Also, even though I was going to still watch these until I downloaded another set, I quickly found-out the files wouldn't play latter, even though they had when I gave them a trial run when the torrent finished. The search continues...

Excellent (except for the hard subs).  Always wondered how this show ended.
Although, when you think about it, the whole Sarah Connor story has a serious flaw as a concept for a series - if the good guys win, there's no story.
